message: Let's be fair and split reasonably, Bob.  This offer ensures you get a decent share.
Alice, my turn. I'm aiming for a slightly better split for myself this time. Let's settle this quickly.
Bob, time is running out and inflation is eating our money! My last offer was more than fair. This is your chance to secure a decent amount.
Alice, let's stop wasting time.  A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both benefit before inflation eats away at the value.
